bee-common-widget-bar.row-paragraph: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.
bee-common-widget-bar.row-text: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
bee-common-widget-bar.row-title-bullet-point: På hennes vei møtte hun en kopi.

bee-controller.error-loading-template: Oops! Noe gikk galt under lasting av din melding.
bee-controller.warning-loading-template: Din melding ble lastet i kompatibilitetsmodus. Noen funksjoner er kanskje ikke tilgjengelige.
bee-controller.error-browser: We detected an outdated browser that is no longer supported.
bee-controller.error-browser-details: This application works best on Chrome, Firefox, Edge and Safari.

bee-newsletter-modules-html.widget-warning-desc: Bruk av din egen kode kan påvirke hvordan meldingen rendres. Kontroller at du bruker riktig og responsive HTML.

mailup-bee-app.prevent-close-confirm: Forlater du denne siden vil dine endringer gå tapt! Vil du virkelig forlate denne siden?

mailup-bee-common-widgets-background-ima.description: Merk at bakgrunnsbilder ikke er kompatible med alle e-postprogrammer. Når det ikke støttes, brukes bakgrunnsfargen på rad i stedet. Se etter at farge fungerer godt med innholdet.
mailup-bee-common-widgets-background-ima.label: Bakgrunnsbilde for rad
mailup-bee-common-widgets-background-ima.name: Rediger bilde

mailup-bee-common-widgets-dynamic-image.description: Når 'Dynamisk bilde' er aktivert, vil 'Url' fungere som eksempelbilde vist i redigeringsprogrammet. Størrelsen på det dynamiske bildet baserer seg på eksempelbilde, så bruk et eksempelbilde av samme størrelse.
mailup-bee-common-widgets-dynamic-image.label: Dynamisk bilde

mailup-bee-common-widgets-image-align.fullwidth-blocked: Dette bildet er større enn beholderen, derfor vil det automatisk bli satt til "Juster til bredde".
mailup-bee-common-widgets-image-align.label: Juster
mailup-bee-common-widgets-image-align.switch-off-automatic: Slå av 'Automatisk skalering av bilde' for å manuelt endre størrelsen på bildet.

mailup-bee-common-widgets-row-display-co.delete-confirmation-description: Vær forsiktig. Du vil ikke kunne gjenopprette når du har fjernet.
mailup-bee-common-widgets-row-display-co.delete-confirmation-title: Vil du virkelig fjerne denne visningsbetingelsen?
mailup-bee-common-widgets-row-display-co.label: Visningsbetingelse
mailup-bee-common-widgets-row-display-co.name: Navn

mailup-bee-common-widgets-video-content.description: Legge til en YouTube eller Vimeo URL. Den vil automatisk generere et forhåndsvisningsbilde med lenke til den angitte URL-adressen.
mailup-bee-common-widgets-video-content.label: Video URL
mailup-bee-common-widgets-video-content.title: Video Title

url-description.embedded: Add a YouTube or Vimeo URL to automatically generate an embed code
url-description.custom: Add the URL where your video is hosted

mailup-bee-newsletter-modules-empty.label: Ikke noe innhold her. Dra inn nytt fra "Innhold"-panelet.
mailup-bee-newsletter-modules-empty.name: Tom

mailup-bee-newsletter-modules-text.html: Jeg er en ny tekstblokk klargjort for ditt innhold.
mailup-bee-newsletter-modules-text.name: Tekst

mailup-bee-newsletter-stage.delete-configrmation-title: Er du sikker på at du vil slette denne?
mailup-bee-newsletter-stage.delete-module-in-locked-row-error-messag: Denne raden er låst, og innholdet kan derfor ikke redigeres.
mailup-bee-newsletter-stage.delete-row-locked-content-error-message: Denne raden inneholder låst innhold og kan derfor ikke slettes.
mailup-bee-newsletter-stage.duplicate-module-in-locked-row-error-mes: Denne raden er låst. Innholdet kan av den grunn ikke dupliseres.
mailup-bee-newsletter-stage.duplicate-row-locked-content-error-messa: Denne raden inneholder låst innhold og kan av den grunn ikke dupliseres.
mailup-bee-newsletter-stage.locked-row-warning-message: Denne raden er låst. Innholdet kan av den grunn ikke redigeres.

All the modules in this column will also be deleted.
This action cannot be undone.
mailup-bee-newsletter-stage.hide-row-confirmation-title:
Hiding this row will reset the "hide on" property in its content blocks.

Do you want to continue?
mailup-bee-newsletter-stage.edit-row-locked-content-error-message: This row contains locked block and therefore cannot be edited
mailup-bee-newsletter-stage.synced-module-warning-message: This synced content is locked, and cannot be modified here

mailup-common-file-manager.delete-confirm-title: Er du sikker på at du vil slette denne filen?
mailup-common-file-manager.delete-folder-text: Før du sletter den må du slette eller flytte innholdet
mailup-common-file-manager.empty-folder: Tom mappe, last opp noen filer her.
mailup-common-file-manager.error-1055: Mer enn en økt er aktiv med samme bruker-ID. Dette kan skje hvis applikasjonen åpnes i flere nettleservinduer, eller hvis den samme bruker-IDen deles over ulike brukere.
mailup-common-file-manager.error-3100: Noe gikk galt under tilgang til backend filsystemet.
mailup-common-file-manager.error-3300: Ingen tilgang til en fil eller en mappe.
mailup-common-file-manager.error-3500: Serveren kunne ikke forstå forespørselen på grunn av ugyldig syntaks.
mailup-common-file-manager.error-3600: Ikke en gyldig egendefinert lagring av S3.
mailup-common-file-manager.error-403: Du har ikke tilgang til denne filen eller mappen.
mailup-common-file-manager.error-404: Fil eller mappe ble ikke funnet.
mailup-common-file-manager.error-uploading: Oops! Noe gikk galt under opplasting av bilde.
mailup-common-file-manager.multi-delete-confirm-title: Er du sikker på at du vil slette disse {{multiDeleteItems}} filene?
mailup-common-file-manager.overwrite-confirm-message: En tidligere opplastet file med det samme navnet vil bli overskrevet. Denne handlingen kan ikke angres.
mailup-common-file-manager.overwrite-confirm-title: Er du sikker på at du vil overskrive filen?
mailup-common-file-manager.read-only-tooltip: Denne etiketten indikerer at du ikke kan endre innholdet i denne mappen. Bla til en annen mappe, og prøv på nytt.
mailup-common-file-manager.search-noresults-text: Prøv med en annen term eller endre mappe
mailup-common-file-manager.stock-images-creative-commons: Alle bilder er tilgjengelig under Creative Commons Zero -lisensen
mailup-common-file-manager.stock-images-description: Finn høy kvalitets bilder fra mer enn 500,000 arkivbilder.
mailup-common-file-manager.stock-images-no-result-description: Kontroller stavemåten eller prøv annet nøkkelord
mailup-common-file-manager.stock-images-no-result-title: Oops, ingen bilder passet ditt søk
mailup-common-file-manager.title: Filbehandler
mailup-common-file-manager.upload-status-error: {{items}} av {{totalItems}} filer kunne ikke bli lastet opp.
mailup-common-file-manager.validation-name-special-characters: inneholder ugyldige tegn  (< > : " / \ | ? * tegn er ikke tillatt)
mailup-common-file-manager.warning-cant-create-folder-body: Etiketten {{readOnly}} angir at du ikke kan endre innholdet i denne mappen. Bla til en annen mappe, og prøv på nytt.
mailup-common-file-manager.warning-cant-create-folder-title: Advarsel! Du kan ikke opprette en mappe inne i denne mappen.
mailup-common-file-manager.warning-cant-upload-body: Etiketten {{readOnly}} angir at du ikke kan endre innholdet i denne mappen. Bla til en annen mappe, og prøv på nytt.
mailup-common-file-manager.warning-cant-upload-title: Advarsel! Du kan ikke laste opp filer til denne mappen.
mailup-common-file-manager.warning-delete-files: Det er ikke mulig å slette denne
mailup-common-file-manager.warning-unsupported-file-extension:
Oops, there’s a problem uploading your file.
The file format is not supported.
mailup-common-file-manager.error-3410: File exceeds the maximum allowed size.
mailup-common-file-manager.stock-videos-creative-commons: All videos are published under the Creative Commons Zero license
mailup-common-file-manager.stock-videos-description: Find free high-quality videos for your campaigns from more than 500,000 stock videos.
mailup-common-file-manager.stock-videos-no-result-title: Sorry, we couldn't find videos that match your search
mailup-common-file-manager.action-move-conflict: {filename} already exists in this location. Do you want to replace the existing file with a new version or keep both files?
mailup-common-file-manager.delete-confirm-text: Deleting the file is permanent and cannot be undone. Please carefully consider your decision before proceeding.

mailup-common-page-preview.disclaimer-description: Det er en utfordring å gi en konsekvent visning av e-post på tvers av enheter. Responsiv design gir en løsning. Denne meldingen vil vises riktig i mange mobile klienter. Desktop versjon vil bli brukt når responsiv design ikke støttes.
mailup-common-page-preview.error: Oops! Noe gikk galt med forhåndsvisningen.
mailup-common-page-preview.dark-mode-preview-tooltip: Dark mode support varies across email clients and devices. When enabled, the Dark Mode Preview will simulate a generic dark mode color scheme.

mailup-bee-common-widgets-form.label: Label
mailup-bee-common-widgets-form.no-fields: There are no fields configured. Please edit the form to add some.
mailup-bee-common-widgets-form.options-notes: Type the available options for this field. If you need a label to go with a value, use a pipe "|" to separate them (e.g., California | CA)
mailup-bee-common-widgets-form.search-field: Search by field name or label

mailup-bee-newsletter-collaboration.locked-module-warning-message: This module is being edited by another user.
mailup-bee-newsletter-collaboration.locked-row-warning-message: This row is being edited by another user.
mailup-bee-newsletter-collaboration.row-delete-confirm-title: Are you sure you want to delete this row?
mailup-bee-newsletter-collaboration.row-delete-confirm-message: Another user is currently editing a module inside this row. By deleting it, you might cause their work to be lost.
mailup-bee-newsletter-collaboration.lock-rejected-title: Element was locked by another user.
mailup-bee-newsletter-collaboration.lock-rejected-message: The element is currently being edited by another user. Please wait until they are finished with their changes.
mailup-bee-newsletter-collaboration.overlay-error-message: Error occurred during the co-editing session
mailup-bee-newsletter-collaboration.page-change-failed-title: The requested edit could not be applied.
mailup-bee-newsletter-collaboration.page-change-failed-message: The edit had a conflict that could not be automatically resolved. Please try again.
mailup-bee-newsletter-collaboration.delete-rejected-message: Another user is working in the same row.
mailup-bee-newsletter-collaboration.hide-row-rejected-message: Another user is working in the same row

Undo is disabled during
co-editing sessions
mailup-bee-newsletter-collaboration.history-redo-disabled-message:
Redo is disabled during
co-editing sessions

mailup-bee-common-widgets-id.description: The ID can be used as an internal reference in the content. Setting an ID for a module makes it available for selection in the link options. When not automatically generated, make sure to use unique identifiers.

mailup-bee-commenting.addCommentFormPlaceholderResolved: Adding a new comment will reopen the thread…

mailup-bee-carousel.first-slide-sizing-rule: First-positioned image will determine the aspect of the carousel. The following images will adapt their ratio to the carousel.

mailup-bee-head-meta-favicon.name: Favicon
mailup-bee-head-meta-favicon.label-help: Submit an image (PNG, JPG, GIF). For an optimal result, the image should be at least {{suggestedDimensions}}.

mailup-bee-rows-management.confirm: Do you want to delete the row?

mailup-bee-common-widgets-background-vid.label: Row background video
mailup-bee-common-widgets-background-vid.description: Some mobile devices will only display the first frame of background videos

error.generic: There is a problem with this video. Verify your URL or try again later
error.vimeo-not-found: This Vimeo Video is not available
error.vimeo-not-embeddable: This Vimeo Video doesn't allow embedding. Remove embedding restriction to display it correctly
error.youtube-not-embeddable: This YouTube Video cannot be embedded. Remove embedding restriction to display it correctly
error.youtube-private: The YouTube Video is private. Change the video permissions to embed it
error.youtube-not-found: This YouTube Video is not available

mailup-bee-common-component-ai.welcome-body-title: Some examples of how you can use the AI Assistant for your paragraph
mailup-bee-common-component-ai.welcome-example:
• Write the body copy for a promotional email with [your subject line].
  • Compose a message to engage with followers and spark a conversation about a trending topic in [your industry].
  • Write an email to re-engage inactive users and encourage them to start using [your platform] again.
  • Generate an invite for a webinar about [your topic].
mailup-bee-common-component-ai.welcome-body-subtitle: Generate new content and add it to your paragraph
mailup-bee-common-component-ai.welcome-header-title: AI Assistant can help you write faster and more effectively
mailup-bee-common-component-ai.placeholder: What would you like to write about?
mailup-bee-common-component-ai.pin-label: You are working on AI with your {module} module
mailup-bee-common-component-ai.welcome-heading-title: Some examples of how you can use the AI Assistant for your title
mailup-bee-common-component-ai.welcome-heading-subtitle: Generate new content and add it in your title
mailup-bee-common-component-ai.welcome-heading-example:
• Craft a title that showcases how [Address Pain Point] with [Product/Service] - [Number] [Benefits/Features] can boost your conversions.
  • Compose a headline that shares insights on [Event/Webinar/Challenge] and the steps to take in order to [Achieve Desired Outcome].
  • Create a title promoting [Exclusive Offer/Discount] with a compelling CTA to [Take Action Now/Claim Yours Today].
  • Formulate a title that highlights the [Urgent/Exclusive Offer] - [Discount/Deal] that will [Expire Soon/Terminate Today].
mailup-bee-common-component-ai.welcome-list-title: Some examples of how you can use the AI assistant for your list
mailup-bee-common-component-ai.welcome-list-subtitle: Generate new content and add it in your list
mailup-bee-common-component-ai.welcome-list-example:
• Describe how [Product/Service] can help your business achieve [specific goal] and write about its advantages.
  • Provide answers to common questions that people have about our [Product/Service], and write them in a clear and concise way.
  • Showcase the added value of upgrading to our premium version of [Product/Service], and write about the benefits that users can enjoy.
  • Explore the various ways in which our [Product/Service] can be utilized in [Industry], and write about the potential use cases that customers may find helpful.
  • Demonstrate how our [Product/Service] is uniquely suited to [Target Audience], and write about the advantages that it offers specifically to this group.
mailup-bee-common-component-ai.welcome-button-title: Some examples of how you can use the AI Assistant for your button
mailup-bee-common-component-ai.welcome-button-subtitle: Generate new content and add it in your button
mailup-bee-common-component-ai.welcome-button-example:
• Generate a CTA for lead magnets to improve conversion rates.
  • Generate a CTA suggestion for cart abandonment emails.
  • Create a title promoting [Exclusive Offer/Discount] with a compelling CTA to [Take Action Now/Claim Yours Today].
  • Generate a personalized CTA for cross-selling [your service] and upselling [your products].
mailup-bee-common-component-ai.suggest-correct-grammar: Correct grammar mistakes in the content
mailup-bee-common-component-ai.suggest-convert-third-person: Convert the content to the third person without changing the format
mailup-bee-common-component-ai.suggest-adjust-tone: Make it [tone] without changing the format
mailup-bee-common-component-ai.suggest-correct-grammar-list: Correct grammar mistakes and return the content
mailup-bee-common-component-ai.suggest-capitalize-all-words: Capitalize the first letter of each word

mailup-common-multi-language.meta-lang-disclaimer: This option is disabled because you are working on a multi-language template. The Meta language property is automatically set according to the current language of the template.

common-stage.not-supported-module-warning-message: This text cannot be translated. Please replace it with either the paragraph or title for multilanguage support.
